de.stock.deserializer

Class Deserializer

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.stock.deserializer.Deserializer

  • public final class Deserializer
extends java.lang.Object
    The parser loads nearly all the content of the game.

    All environments, events, tradeables, ... are serialized in json-formatted strings
    and saved in files, so content can be injected very fast and clean.
    You can find the file extensions in Settings_Deserializer

    The game uses the Flexjson library as this library is easy to use and provides deep serialization.

    LevelPacks are loaded through LevelPackLoader
    Author:
    chlange

    • Method Detail

      • deserialize

        public static java.lang.Integer deserialize(java.lang.Integer type)
        Deserializes all files regarding to type

        - Tradeables are saved in TradeableHandler
        - Events are saved in ActionObserver
        - Environments are saved in EnvironmentHandler
        Parameters:
        type - The type of object (See Settings_Deserializer). Files of this type get deserialized
        Returns:
        number of deserialized elements

      • deserialize

        public static java.lang.Object deserialize(java.lang.Integer type,
                           java.lang.String string)
        Creates object(s) from passed String String gets deep deserialized which means that objects of arrays in the object are created, too
        Parameters:
        string - The string to deserialize
        type - The type of object (See Settings_Deserializer)
        Returns:
        An instance of the class regarding to type from string on success else null

      • deserializeFiles

        private static java.lang.Integer deserializeFiles(java.lang.Integer type,
                                 java.util.ArrayList<java.io.File> files)
        Deserialize all files from type
        Parameters:
        type - The type of objects
        files - The files to deserialize
        Returns:
        Non-negative number of deserialized objects upon success otherwise -1

        Parameters:

        Returns:
